question: Which county army organises Jashn -e-Kokernag to strengthen jawan-awam relationship?
explanation: Indian Army organises Jashn -e-Kokernag to strengthen jawan-awam relationship. With the slogan of"Jawan aur Awaam Amun Hai Muqam"( Army and Locals together, peace will prevail ), 19 batch Rashtriya Rifles of the Indian Army on 19th October 2017 organised 'Jashn-e-Breng' festival in Kokernag village of the Anantnag district to promote peace and brotherhood between security forces and the local population.
